room_title: Escape room "The Perfect Crime" by Escape Room Madness in New York
review: Some of the puzzles were fairly interesting and fun, but there were some concepts that I did not like. Clues are very antisocial with little guidance from the game masters. The last puzzle was also a near impossible one even after having it explained. I wish there was a more personal connection so there could be more guidance with difficult connections.

room_title: Escape room "The Perfect Crime" by Escape Room Madness in New York
review: My wife and I got a chance to play the Perfect Crime and really enjoyed the puzzles. The game was in a large, well-lit room and had a whodunit theme in which you learned about suspects throughout the game and needed to solve the murder in 60 minutes before the killer killed again.Hopefully we can come back to New York and play the other games someday.

room_title: Escape room "The Perfect Crime" by Escape Room Madness in New York
review: My daughter and I had a great time! We did the Crime Scene room and we did escape. The staff, was so helpful! Leo, our "helper" was awesome! I would definitely go back on our next trip to New York!

room_title: Escape room "The Perfect Crime" by Escape Room Madness in New York
review: Had a great time with my brother. We were added to another group of fun people. We had an hour to complete the crime scene investigation. We did it! Next time we will try the apocalypse challenge!

room_title: Escape room "The Perfect Crime" by Escape Room Madness in New York
review: Such a nice place, you can feel like if you are in a real movie set. The room has a very professional customize and the staff treatment is excellent! Keep it up guys!

room_title: Escape room "The Perfect Crime" by Escape Room Madness in New York
review: So much fun!!! Thanks!!! It was hard at some points because there was only 2 of us, but they gave us a clue to help us get going!
